title: New: Krkslott – No Winds Blow
content:
Sometimes the simplest track can ultimately prove to be the most moving, a fact that I’m sure Sweden’s Krkslott would testify to.

The solo project of Amanda Randau from folk outfit Collections of Swanvapor, Krskslott’s debut track No Winds Blow is comprised entirely of her stunning vocals and a gently strummed acoustic guitar. Utilizing the layered, echoed vocals to fantastic effect, No Winds Blow is a stirring, six minute journey, simultaneously heartwarming and devastating. Stream No Winds Blow below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
